CYBERPUNK_AGENT.TITLE: Cyberpunk Agent
CYBERPUNK_AGENT.DESCRIPTION: A FoundryVTT module that adds a cyberpunk-style messaging system for players to communicate through their characters' agents

CHAT7.TITLE: Chat7
CHAT7.NO_CONTACTS_DESC: The GM needs to configure your contacts in the module settings.

DIALOGS.SELECT_ACTOR_DESC: Choose which Actor to use with the Agent:

NOTIFICATIONS.NO_ACTOR_ACCESS: You don't have access to any Actor to use the Agent.
NOTIFICATIONS.GM_ONLY: Only the Game Master can access the Contact Manager.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Cyberpunk Agent Settings
SETTINGS.CONTACT_NETWORKS_HINT: Configure contact networks for each Actor
SETTINGS.CONTACT_MANAGER_HINT: Open the contact manager to configure contact networks for each character
